entry.title: FREEZING DRIZZLE ADVISORY , Dryden
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 03:56 AM CST Thursday 29 December 2022

entry.title: Current Conditions: Mist, -5.8°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Dryden Airport 09:19 AM CST Thursday 29 December 2022
Condition: Mist
Temperature: -5.8°C
Pressure: 100.3 kPa
Visibility: 3.2 km
Humidity: 95 %
Wind Chill: -8
Dewpoint: -6.5°C
Wind: NE 5 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Thursday: Periods of freezing drizzle. High minus 1. POP 60%
entry.summary: Cloudy with 60 percent chance of freezing drizzle. Fog patches dissipating near noon. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 1. Wind chill near minus 7. Forecast issued 07:36 AM CST Thursday 29 December 2022

entry.title: Thursday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 12. POP 30%
entry.summary: Cloudy with 30 percent chance of flurries. Risk of freezing drizzle this evening. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 12. Wind chill minus 5 this evening and minus 16 overnight. Forecast issued 07:36 AM CST Thursday 29 December 2022

entry.title: Friday: Chance of flurries. Temperature steady near minus 12. POP 30%
entry.summary: Cloudy. 30 percent chance of flurries in the morning. Wind up to 15 km/h. Temperature steady near minus 12. Wind chill near minus 19. Forecast issued 07:36 AM CST Thursday 29 December 2022
